name: Switcharoo (omer.behar)
description:
Switcharoo:

Game Objective:

The Pikachus that are facing to the right need to switch places with those that are facing left.

Rules:

A Pikachu can move only to an empty place, if it cannot move to the nearest space it can jump above the interference and move two spots (if its empty).

A Pikachu can only move in the direction its facing.

Good Luck!!!
